welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Villiers-le-Bel, the charming city known for its rich history and stunning architecture. We invite you to immerse yourself in our culture and take in all the beauty this city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Le Bourget Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Le Bourget Airport, primarily used for private and business aviation.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest and largest terminal at Charles De Gaulle Airport, serving a variety of airlines and destinations.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The second largest terminal at Charles De Gaulle Airport, divided into seven sub-terminals and serving a variety of airlines and destinations.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The smallest terminal at Charles De Gaulle Airport, primarily serving low-cost airlines and domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but a premium option is also available for faster speeds and unlimited usage.

terminals.name: South Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: West Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves low-cost and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
